age_terms.age: ✓ I'm 21+ years of age and agree to the

landing_hero.address_explanation_short: We need an address to show product availability
landing_hero.address_explanation_long: We partner with local stores to fulfill orders. We need to know the destination so we can determine which stores serve that location and which products are available there.

delivery_info.switch_store_cart_warning: Please note that changing stores may clear some items from your cart

cart.birthdate_required: Due to legal requirements, we need to collect date of birth to verify you are over the legal age to purchase these items

checkout_complete.next_steps_base: You’ll receive an email confirmation shortly.
checkout_complete.next_steps_shipped: We’ll send another email with your tracking number when your order ships.
checkout_complete.next_steps_pickup: We’ll send another email when your order is ready for pickup.
checkout_complete.next_steps_shipped_and_pickup: We’ll send additional emails when your order ships and when it’s ready for pickup.

product_list.confirm_swap_header: Are you sure you want to switch stores?
product_list.confirm_swap_shipped_header: Are you sure you want to switch to a shipping store?
product_list.confirm_swap_and_change_base: Please confirm you’d like to switch from {{former_supplier_name}} ({{former_delivery_type}}) to {{next_supplier_name}} ({{next_delivery_type}}).
product_list.confirm_swap_and_change_cart_warning: Items currently in your cart may be removed.

category_dropdown.wine: Sorry, no wine products are available for your address
category_dropdown.beer: Sorry, no beer products are available for your address
category_dropdown.liquor: Sorry, no liquor products are available for your address
category_dropdown.mixers: Sorry, no mixers are available for your address

app_install_section.headline: Drinks on tap.
app_install_section.copy: Download our free mobile app for an even better shopping experience. Get wine, liquor, beer and more delivered with just a few taps.
app_install_section.ios_download_alt_text: Download from the iOS App Store
app_install_section.google_download_alt_text: Download from the Google Play Store

shipping_warning_modal.header: This product is only available via shipping
shipping_warning_modal.body_vineyard_select:
Vineyard Select wines are shipped directly from the producer,
so they can't be delivered same day.
shipping_warning_modal.body_default: Products sold by {{supplier_name}} will be shipped. Same-day delivery is not available.
shipping_warning_modal.shipping_time_estimate: Shipments typically arrive in 3 to 5 business days

split_warning_modal.body_default: Keep in mind that adding items from different stores will result in separate deliveries.
split_warning_modal.cancel: Don't add the item to cart
split_warning_modal.confirm: Got it - add item to cart

supplier_change_modal.shipping_time_estimate: Shipments typically arrive in 3 to 5 business days

initial_content.h5: Can we buy you a drink?
initial_content.line_2: when you join our email list

new_user_content.h5: You've been added to our email list

offer.headline: $5 off your first order
offer.copy: Join our email list to get exclusive deals, giveaways, cocktail recipes and more.

new_user.end: at checkout and get $5 off your order!

existing_user.message: Looks like you're already signed up. Welcome back!

address_entry.no_address: Please enter a delivery address to shop.
address_entry.not_found: We could not find your address, try removing apt/suite numbers & select one of the suggested addresses.

category.wine: Wine is currently unavailable at this address.
category.beer: Beer is currently unavailable at this address.
category.liquor: Liquor is currently unavailable at this address.
category.mixers: Mixers are currently unavailable at this address.

unavailable.default_body: Your current store does not carry or is out of stock of the requested items.

product_detail.address_entry_prompt: For pricing and availability, enter your address
